name: Eva Wong
description: Eva is Director of Legal at Parity Technologies,Â a blockchain engineering company, which is one of the largest contributors to the Polkadot blockchain in terms of team size and code contributed. She has worked in Tech for over 16 years having worked on the BBC's pioneering open source strategy, AML tech, supported start-up projects, Parity Technologies' advocacy work on digital asset regulation in the US and UK and provides thought leadership on blockchain and law.
